hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Ya ha ha! You found me!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #the Megaton Hammer#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Central Pillar Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Deku Tree# and #the Hover Boots#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #5# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.
